aegisofabyssalflame.description:
Grant the character to which this is attached 3 Shield points.
Before this Shield is depleted, the character to which this is attached will deal +1 Pyro DMG.
aegisofabyssalflame.descriptionraw: Grant the character to which this is attached <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points</color>.\nBefore this {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> is depleted, the character to which this is attached will deal +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
aegisofabyssalflame.name: Aegis of Abyssal Flame

anemo.description:
Spend the Anemo Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
anemo.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#80FFD7FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1105}Anemo</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
anemo.name: Anemo

anemodmg.description:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
Cryo Swirl: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Hydro Swirl: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Pyro Swirl: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Electro Swirl: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
anemodmg.descriptionraw:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
anemodmg.name: Anemo DMG

arcaneedict.description:
Each player can only use 1 Arcane Legend card per match.
An Arcane Legend card can only be played should an Arcane Edict still be present. After an Arcane Legend card is played, the current match's Arcane Edict use will be consumed.
arcaneedict.descriptionraw: Each player can only use 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}Arcane Legend card per match.\nAn {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}Arcane Legend card can only be played should an {SPRITE_PRESET#1112}Arcane Edict still be present. After an {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}Arcane Legend card is played, the current match's {SPRITE_PRESET#1112}Arcane Edict use will be consumed.
arcaneedict.name: Arcane Edict

bloodblossom.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Pyro DMG to the character to which this is attached.
Usage(s):1
bloodblossom.descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>:1</color>
bloodblossom.name: Blood Blossom

characterclosesttoyourcurrentactivechara.description:
The opposing "character closest to your current active character" is the opposing character whose position is closest to that of your active character.
If multiple such characters exist, the one with the foremost position will be viewed as being "closest."
characterclosesttoyourcurrentactivechara.descriptionraw: The opposing "character closest to your current active character" is the opposing character whose position is closest to that of your active character.\nIf multiple such characters exist, the one with the foremost position will be viewed as being "closest."
characterclosesttoyourcurrentactivechara.name: Character Closest to Your Current Active Character
characterclosesttoyourcurrentactivechara.nameraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Character Closest to Your Current Active Character</color>

chargedattack.description: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
chargedattack.descriptionraw: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.
chargedattack.name: Charged Attack

clusterbloomarrow.description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Dendro DMG.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
clusterbloomarrow.descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s): 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
clusterbloomarrow.name: Clusterbloom Arrow

combataction.description:
After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.
Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action.
combataction.descriptionraw: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
combataction.name: Combat Action

crowfeathercover.description:
The character with this attached deals +1 Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG.
Usages: 2
crowfeathercover.descriptionraw: The character with this attached deals +1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Skill</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Burst</color> DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 2</color>
crowfeathercover.name: Crowfeather Cover

cryo.description:
Spend the Cryo Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
cryo.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#99FFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1101}Cryo</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
cryo.name: Cryo

cryoapplication.description:
When Cryo is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
Melt: No effect
Superconduct: No effect
Frozen: The target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
cryoapplication.descriptionraw:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}Cryo is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: The target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
cryoapplication.name: Cryo Application

cryodmg.description:
Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
Melt: DMG +2 for this instance
Superconduct: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Frozen: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
cryodmg.descriptionraw:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)
cryodmg.name: Cryo DMG

dendro.description:
Spend the Dendro Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
dendro.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#7EC236FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1107}Dendro</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
dendro.name: Dendro

dendroapplication.description:
When Dendro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
Bloom: Creates a [Dendro Core] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
Burning: Creates a [Burning Flame] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
Quicken: Creates a [Catalyzing Field] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
dendroapplication.descriptionraw:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
dendroapplication.name: Dendro Application

dendrodmg.description:
Applies Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
Bloom: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Dendro Core] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
Burning: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Burning Flame] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
Quicken: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Catalyzing Field] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}Dendro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG

durationrounds.description:
Each time you reach the end of a Round, Duration (Rounds) -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once Duration (Rounds) runs out.
durationrounds.descriptionraw: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
durationrounds.name: Duration (Rounds)

electro.description:
Spend the Electro Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
electro.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#FFACFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1104}Electro</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
electro.name: Electro

electroapplication.description:
When Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
Overloaded: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
Superconduct: No effect
Electro-Charged: No effect
Quicken: Creates a [Catalyzing Field] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
electroapplication.descriptionraw:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reactions triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
electroapplication.name: Electro Application

electrodmg.description:
Applies Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
Overloaded: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
Superconduct: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Electro-Charged: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
Quicken: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Catalyzing Field] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
electrodmg.descriptionraw:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}Electro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Superconduct</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Quicken</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>] that grants +1 DMG to the next 2 instances of Dendro or Electro DMG
electrodmg.name: Electro DMG

electroinfusion.description:
When the character to which it is attached to deals Physical Damage, it will be turned into Electro DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2
electroinfusion.descriptionraw: When the character to which it is attached to deals {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical Damage</color>, it will be turned into {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>: 2
electroinfusion.name: Electro Infusion

elementalburst.description: When the character's Energy is maxed out, you can consume that Energy to use a powerful Elemental Burst.
elementalburst.descriptionraw: When the character's {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy is maxed out, you can consume that {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use a powerful Elemental Burst.
elementalburst.name: Elemental Burst

energy.description:
Characters must consume Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.
When characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 Energy.
energy.descriptionraw: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
energy.name: Energy

fastaction.description:
You can continue with other actions after conducting 1 Fast Action.
Only after conducting 1 Combat Action will the turn pass over to your opponent.
fastaction.descriptionraw: You can continue with other actions after conducting 1 Fast Action.\nOnly after conducting 1 Combat Action will the turn pass over to your opponent.
fastaction.name: Fast Action

fatuiambusher.description:
Fatui Ambushers will trigger their effects after characters on the side of the field they are at use Skills, and will deal DMG to the active character on that side of the field. (Once per Round)
There are 4 kinds of Fatui Ambushers in total:
Cryo Cicin Mage: Deals 1 Cryo DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Mirror Maiden: Deals 1 Hydro DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Pyroslinger Bracer: Deals 1 Pyro DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
Electrohammer Vanguard: Deals 1 Electro DMG when triggered, 2 Usages.
fatuiambusher.descriptionraw:
Fatui Ambushers will trigger their effects after characters on the side of the field they are at use Skills, and will deal DMG to the active character on that side of the field. (Once per Round)
There are 4 kinds of Fatui Ambushers in total:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Cicin Mage</color>: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> when triggered, 2 Usages.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Mirror Maiden</color>: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> when triggered, 2 Usages.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyroslinger Bracer</color>: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> when triggered, 2 Usages.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electrohammer Vanguard</color>: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> when triggered, 2 Usages.
fatuiambusher.name: Fatui Ambusher

geo.description:
Spend the Geo Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
geo.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#FFE699FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1106}Geo</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
geo.name: Geo

geodmg.description:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
Cryo Crystallize: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
Hydro Crystallize: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
Pyro Crystallize: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
Electro Crystallize: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

Spend the Hydro Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
hydro.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1102}Hydro</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)

immunitytodefeats1willnotbedefeated.description:
Certain effects will grant characters an immunity to being defeated when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.
When this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a defeat. (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)
immunitytodefeats1willnotbedefeated.descriptionraw: Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#FFFFFFFF>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.\nWhen this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#FFFFFFFF>defeat.</color> (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)
immunitytodefeats1willnotbedefeated.name: Immunity to Defeat

matchingelement.description:
You must use Elemental Dice that match the number and element featured here to pay this type of cost.
(An Omni Die can be considered of any Element.)
matchingelement.descriptionraw: You must use Elemental Dice that match the number and element featured here to pay this type of cost.\n(An {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Die can be considered of any Element.)
matchingelement.name: Matching Element

omnielement.description: The Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
omnielement.descriptionraw: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
omnielement.name: Omni Element

passiveskill.description: This Skill is constantly in effect and need not to be activated.
passiveskill.descriptionraw: This Skill is constantly in effect and need not to be activated.
passiveskill.name: Passive Skill

physicaldmg.description: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
physicaldmg.descriptionraw: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
physicaldmg.name: Physical DMG

piercingdmg.description: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
piercingdmg.descriptionraw: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
piercingdmg.name: Piercing DMG

plungingattack.description: After a character is switched in to be the Active Character, should their next Combat Action within this Round be a Normal Attack, it will be considered a Plunging Attack for the instance.
plungingattack.descriptionraw: After a character is switched in to be the Active Character, should their next Combat Action within this Round be a Normal Attack, it will be considered a Plunging Attack for the instance.
plungingattack.name: Plunging Attack

prepareskills1prepares.description:
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be prepared over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently preparing a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being prepared, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require preparing cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill")
Only active characters can prepare Skills, and if an active character who is preparing a Skill gets switched off-field, their preparation will be interrupted.
prepareskills1prepares.descriptionraw: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill")\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.
prepareskills1prepares.name: Prepare Skill

pyro.description:
Spend the Pyro Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.
(Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
pyro.descriptionraw: Spend the <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1103}Pyro</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)
pyro.name: Pyro

pyroapplication.description:
When Pyro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
Melt: No effect
Vaporize: No effect
Overloaded: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
Burning: Creates a [Burning Flame] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
pyroapplication.descriptionraw:
When {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro is applied without dealing any DMG, the Elemental Reaction triggered will ignore DMG-dealing effects:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: No effect
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: The target is forcibly switched to the next character
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning</color>: Creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
pyroapplication.name: Pyro Application

pyrodmg.description:
Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
Melt: DMG +2 for this instance
Vaporize: DMG +2 for this instance
Overloaded: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
Burning: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Burning Flame] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
pyrodmg.descriptionraw:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance

{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character

pyrodmg.name: Pyro DMG

pyrorelatedreactions.description:
Melt: DMG +2 for this instance
Vaporize: DMG +2 for this instance
Overloaded: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
Burning: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [Burning Flame] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)
Pyro Crystallize: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
Pyro Swirl: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
pyrorelatedreactions.descriptionraw:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Melt</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Overloaded</color>: DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character

{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Swirl</color>: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
pyrorelatedreactions.name: Pyro-Related Reactions

randomhilichurlsummon.description:
There are 4 kinds of Hilichurl Summons in total:
Cryo Hilichurl Shooter: Deal 1 Cryo DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
Hydro Samachurl: Deal 1 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
Hilichurl Berserker: Deal 1 Pyro DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
Electro Hilichurl Shooter: Deal 1 Electro DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
randomhilichurlsummon.descriptionraw:
There are 4 kinds of Hilichurl Summons in total:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Hilichurl Shooter</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Samachurl</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hilichurl Berserker</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Hilichurl Shooter</color>: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
randomhilichurlsummon.name: Random Hilichurl Summon

riptide.description:
When the character to which this is attached is defeated: Apply Riptide to active character.
When Tartaglia is in Melee Stance, he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.
Duration (Rounds): 2
riptide.descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is defeated: </color>Apply Riptide to active character.\nWhen <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tartaglia</color> is in <color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance</color>, he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>
riptide.name: Riptide

scarletseal.description:
When the character uses a Charged Attack: DMG dealt +2.
Usage(s): 1
scarletseal.descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>:</color> DMG dealt +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color>

shield.description: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
shield.descriptionraw: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
shield.name: Shield

superlativesuperstrength.description:
When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack: Deal +1 DMG. If the Usages are no less than 2, then costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

If the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> are no less than 2, then costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 3 stacks.)

unalignedelement.description: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
unalignedelement.descriptionraw: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.

usages.description:
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 Usage of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 Usages remaining.
